import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './ListStudent.css'; export default function ListStudents(){ const [students,setStudent]=useState({}) const getStudents=()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8000/createStudent') .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data) setStudent(res.data) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getStudents() }) return(
Create Student
{ students.map((student,index)=>{ return( ) }) }
Roll NO First Name Last Name Email Course Assign Mentor
{index} {student.firstName} {student.lastName} {student.email} {student.course}
) }
